form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: LOI KHAI HUU THE CUUA NGUO TY NAN XIN NAP CANH HOA KY, A2209370

full_text: Screened by NARA, 2/10/2023 BO TU PHAP HOA KY 3 161 SO DI TRU VA NHAP TICH LOI KHAI HUU THE CUA NGUOI TY NAN XIN NHAP CANH HOA KY A22099370 Ten: NGUYEN BA LAM Tuoi: 77 UNG VIEN PHAI KHAI LA DU DIEU KIEN DE NHAP CANH VAO NUOC MY NGOAI TRU TRUONG HOP DUOC LUAT PHAP QUY DINH KHAC, NHUNG NGUOI THUOC CAC LOAI SAU DAY KHONG DUOC VAO HOA KY: Nhung Ngoai Kieu da pham phap va bi ket an vi mot trong toi ke ca nhung toi pham thuoc pham vi luan ly (khong ke cac vi pham luu thong nho nhat) nhung Ngoai Kieu da tham gia hoac CO y dinh tham gia hoat dong mai dam; nhung Ngoai Kieu da tung hoac hien la ngúi chu truong VO chinh phu, la doan vien hoac CO lien hê vo'i bat cu dang cong san hay doc tai não, ke ca cac chi nhanh hoac to chuc le thuoc lien he; nhung Ngoai Kieu da tung chu truong hoac giang day, bang cach tu y phat bieu y kien hoac viet sach, bao, hoac gia nhap mot to chuc (i) chong doi Chinh Phu hop phap, (ii) lat do' Chinh Phu bang vo luc, (iii) bao hanh hoac sat hai cac vien chuc Chinh Phu vi chuc vi cong quyen cua ho, (iv) pha hoai bat hop phap cac tai san, (v) pha hoai hoac (vi) cac chu thuyet cong san the gioi, hoac viec thiet lap che do doc tài chuyen che tai Hoa Ky; nhung Ngoai Kieu CO y dinh tham gia cac hoat dong CO hai hoac bat, hóp phap CO tinh cach pha roi noi an; nhung Ngoai Kieu da bi ket an vi pham phap hoac vi pham luat le ve ma tuy, can sa, hoac da buon lau ma túy, can sa; nhung Ngoai Kieu lien he tói viec giup do' nhung nguoi Ngoai Kieu khac nhap canh Hoa Ky bat hop phap; nhung Ngoai Kieu da xin dac mien hoac xin rut khoi khoa huan luyen hoac quan vu thuoc Quan Luc Hoa Ky vi nai ly do Ngoai Kieu cua ho hoac da tung bi loai hoac sa thai khoi quan vu hoac cac khoa huan luyen do. Nhung Ngoai Kieu CO tri khon cham phat trien, dien khung, hoac da tung len con dien mot hoac nhieu lan; Ngoai Kieu bi benh hoan tinh than, ham muon lech lac ve tinh duc, bi benh than kinh, nghien ma tuy, nghien ruou, hoac mac benh truyen nhiem nguy hiem; nhung Ngoai Kieu bi bat tuc the chat, bi benh hoac tinh trang khiem khuyet CO anh huong toi kha nang muu sinh; nhung Ngoai Kieu thuoc loai du, thu du thuc, an xin chuyen nghiep hoac leu long; nhung Ngoai Kieu, da the hoac chu truong da the; nhung Ngoai Kieu da bi truc xuat khoi Hoa Ky trong nam qua, hoac da CO lan bi truc xuat khoi Hoa Ky, hoac da CO lan bi tong khu khoi Hoa Ky voi ton phi do Chinh Phu chiu; nhung Ngoai Kieu da thu dac hoac tim cach thu dac dau chieu khan bang cach gia mao, gian tra; nhung Ngoai Kieu roi khoi Hoa Ky hoac song 3 ngoai nuoc My de tron quan dich trong thoi chien hoac trong tinh trang
